value:
$nMPID_比翼アイク|I don't know if this is all real or just
a dream. Either way, though, I've got
to keep Mist safe.

$nMPID_比翼アイク|My father leads the strongest group
of mercenaries in the world. I'll do
what it takes to follow his example.

$nMPID_ミスト|Something on your mind? We can talk
about it, if you want!

$nMPID_ミスト|I wanna go outside and play for
a while. Is that OK, Ike?

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Keep behind me when I swing my
sword, Mist. For your own good.

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Have we met somewhere before?
No? My mistake. Anyway, this is
from $Nf.

$nMPID_比翼アイク|My opponent wants to win just as
much as I do. I'd better think fast.
$nMPID_比翼アイク|That went well. Stay close, Mist!

$nMPID_ミスト|Focus on the fight, Ike. I can take
care of myself!
$nMPID_比翼アイク|I'll be just like Father someday!

I'm Ike, and this is my little—where's
she going? Mist, quit wandering off!

$nMPID_比翼アイク|We've been moving for a while, now.
How are you holding up, Mist? If it's
too much, let me know.$k$p$nMPID_ミスト|I'm more worried about you, Ike!
You should give those scrapes
and scratches time to heal.$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|These wouldn't slow Father down at
all. I can't let them slow me, either.$k$pThe longer we're away, the more
I see I've got a long way to go
to measure up to him.$k$p$nMPID_ミスト|Don't push yourself too hard, Ike.
He can't come swooping in to
rescue us here.$k$pActually, now that you mention it...
I am really tired...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|Haha... All right, get on my back, then.
I'll always be here to carry you.
たあっ
でやあっ
うわああっ
くそう…
きゃあっ
$nMPID_二人|Take this!
$nMPID_二人|Here I go! Me too!
$nMPID_比翼アイク|Just like Father!
$nMPID_ミスト|Stay back!
Need to protect Mist...
Go get 'em, Ike!
I'm right behind you!

"It's time!"
"Let's do it!"

"I'll try my best!"
"Be careful."
ふふ…

"Stay close, Mist."
"Right behind you!"
Sounds weird.
This should be fun...
We're off!
$nMPID_ミスト|Wait up, Ike! I'm coming with you!

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Not this time, Mist. This isn't for fun.
I need to train.
$nMPID_ミスト|But staying here is so BORING!

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Maybe so. I need to practice if I want
to get better. And you might get hurt
if you're in the way!

$nMPID_ミスト|I'll be careful, I promise! I'll watch
from a distance.

$nMPID_比翼アイク|*sigh* If you say so...but you better
not wander off. Come on.

$nMPID_ミスト|Great! This is gonna be the most fun
outing ever! Let's go!

Ooh! Look, Ike! A butterfly! Where
are you off to today, Mr. Butterfly?

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Mist! Where are you going? I told you
not to wander off!

$nMPID_ミスト|Oh my gosh! Ike, look at all these
pretty flowers!

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Wow. This place really is in full bloom.
I guess I was too focused on training.

$nMPID_ミスト|I've got an idea! What if we pick
some for Mother? And Father
too, of course!

Because you let me come along, I'll
also make the prettiest crown of
flowers, just for you!

$nMPID_比翼アイク|Erm... Why don't we just make them
a bouquet?

$nMPID_ミスト|No way! We're gonna have matching
crowns! Think how you'll look with a
sword AND a flower crown!
$nMPID_比翼アイク|Wait, what?!
$nMPID_ミスト|I knew this was gonna be fun!
